mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT WBGS_id) companyId From yj_info WHERE mstatus > -2
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT WBGS_id) companyId From yj_info WHERE mstatus > -2 AND WBGS_id!=84000 AND WBGS_id!=84052

SELECT yjinfo.YDQY_Name ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseName,-- 用电企业名称 yjinfo.DF_Name ynBaseEnterpriseSubstationName, -- 电房名称 yjinfo.YDQY_id ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseLongId, -- 用电企业id yjinfo.DF_id ynBaseEnterpriseSubstationLongId,-- 电房id CAST(COUNT(1) AS char) AS totalMonitoringPoint,-- 电房所属监测点总数 IFNULL(CAST((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ynyjjc.yj_info A WHERE A.YDQY_id = yjinfo.YDQY_id AND A.DF_id = yjinfo.DF_id AND A.mStatus = 0) AS char), '') AS newMonitoringPoint, -- 新增监测点但是还没运行数目 IFNULL(CAST((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ynyjjc.yj_info A WHERE A.YDQY_id = yjinfo.YDQY_id AND A.DF_id = yjinfo.DF_id AND A.mStatus = 1) AS char), '') AS runMonitoringPoint, -- 正常运行的监测点数目 IFNULL(CAST((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ynyjjc.yj_info A WHERE A.YDQY_id = yjinfo.YDQY_id AND A.DF_id = yjinfo.DF_id AND A.mStatus = -1) AS char), '') AS errMonitoringPoint, -- 异常的监测点数目 IFNULL(CAST((CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ynyjjc.yj_info A WHERE A.YDQY_id = yjinfo.YDQY_id AND A.DF_id = yjinfo.DF_id AND A.JCD_Type = 11) > 0 THEN (SELECT LastWD FROM ynyjjc.yj_info A WHERE A.YDQY_id = yjinfo.YDQY_id AND A.DF_id = yjinfo.DF_id AND A.JCD_Type = 11 LIMIT 1) END) AS char), '') AS temperature, -- 温度 IFNULL(CAST((CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ynyjjc.yj_info A WHERE A.YDQY_id = yjinfo.YDQY_id AND A.DF_id = yjinfo.DF_id AND A.JCD_Type = 12) > 0 THEN (SELECT LastSD FROM ynyjjc.yj_info A WHERE A.YDQY_id = yjinfo.YDQY_id AND A.DF_id = yjinfo.DF_id AND A.JCD_Type = 12 LIMIT 1) END) AS char), '') AS humidity, -- 湿度 yjinfo.mstatus mstatus, IF(yjinfo.mstatus = 0, '未生效', IF(yjinfo.mstatus = 1, '已生效', IF(yjinfo.mstatus = -1, '通信异常', IF(yjinfo.mstatus = -1, '已删除', '其他')))) mstatusStr, (SELECT CAST(COUNT(1) AS char) FROM jc_gj_83650 jg8 WHERE jg8.mstatus = 0 AND jg8.DF_id = yjinfo.DF_id) warningCount, IFNULL((SELECT max(jg8.GJ_CLASSTYPE) FROM jc_gj_83650 jg8 WHERE jg8.mstatus = 0 AND jg8.DF_id = yjinfo.DF_id),'') warningMaxLevel FROM yj_info yjinfo WHERE yjinfo.YDQY_id = #{ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseLongId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND yjinfo.mStatus > -2 GROUP BY yjinfo.DF_Name, yjinfo.YDQY_Name, yjinfo.DF_id, yjinfo.YDQY_id

SELECT yjinfo.DF_id ynBaseEnterpriseSubstationLongId, -- 电房id yjinfo.DF_Name ynBaseEnterpriseSubstationName, -- 电房名称 yjinfo.SBTZ_id ynBaseEquipmentLongId, -- 设备台账id yjinfo.SBTZ_Name ynBaseEquipmentName, -- 设备台账名称 yjinfo.JCD_AliasID monitoringPointAliasId, -- 平台自定义id yjinfo.JCD_CoreID monitoringPointCoreId, -- 监测点固件核心id
yjinfo.JCD_Name monitoringPointName, -- 监测点名称 yjinfo.JCD_Type monitoringPointType, -- 监测点类型 1单相，3三相，4四项，11温度，12湿度 （小于10就是基本电参量，大于10的就是环境参量） IF(yjinfo.JCD_Type=1,'单相',IF(yjinfo.JCD_Type=3,'三相',IF(yjinfo.JCD_Type=4,'四相',IF(yjinfo.JCD_Type=11,'温度',IF(yjinfo.JCD_Type=12,'湿度','其他'))))) monitoringPointTypeStr, yjinfo.mstatus mstatus, IF(yjinfo.mstatus = 0, '未生·效', IF(yjinfo.mstatus = 1, '已生效', IF(yjinfo.mstatus = -1, '通信异常', IF(yjinfo.mstatus = -1, '已删除', '其他')))) mstatusStr FROM yj_info yjinfo WHERE yjinfo.DF_id = #{ynBaseEnterpriseSubstationLongId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND yjinfo.mStatus!=-2 ORDER BY yjinfo.SBTZ_id, yjinfo.JCD_CoreID
CALL getJLDData(#{monitoringPointAliasId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{monitoringPointDate,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tag,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
CALL BNgetHarmonic(#{monitoringPointAliasId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{monitoringPointDate,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tag,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
CALL BNgetJLDDataTwo(#{monitoringPointAliasId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{monitoringPointDate,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tag,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
CALL BNgetZero(#{monitoringPointAliasId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{monitoringPointDate,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tag,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
CALL BNgetaggregate(#{monitoringPointAliasId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{monitoringPointDate,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tag,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select ZDL_2345,ADL_2345,BDL_2345,CDL_2345 from jc_fs_83650 where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{nowDateDay1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select Ye_TingdianCount,Ye_TingdianDate from jc_dd_83650 where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select Right_Active_Power,Right_Reactive_Power,Contrary_Active_Power,Contrary_Reactive_Power,Right_Active_Demand,oneDate,Right_Reactive_Demand,twoDate,Contrary_Active_Demand,threeDate,Contrary_ReActive_Demand,fourDate from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select AMAX_Power,AMAX_Date,AMIN_Power,AMIN_Date,RMAX_Power,RMAX_Date,RMIN_Power,RMIN_Date,YS_MAX,YS_MAX_Date,YS_MIN,YS_MIN_Date from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select DLBPH_MAX,DLBPH_MAX_Date,DLBPH_MIN,DLBPH_MIN_Date,DLBPH_AVG,DLBPH_NINEFIVE,DL_AMAX,Dl_AMAXDate,DL_AMIN,DL_AMINDate,DL_BMAX,Dl_BMAXDate,DL_BMIN,DL_BMINDate,DL_CMAX,Dl_CMAXDate,DL_CMIN,DL_CMINDate,DL_LMAX,Dl_LMAXDate,DL_LMIN,DL_LMINDate,sl_zongcount,sl_acount,sl_bcount,sl_ccount,sl_zongdate,sl_adate,sl_bdate,sl_cdate,sl_zxygdn,sl_fxygdn,sl_zxwgdn,sl_fxwgdn from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select DYBPH_JCDate,DYBPH_HGL,DYBPH_CXL,DYBPH_CXDate,DYBPH_MAX,DYBPH_MAX_Date,DYBPH_MIN,DYBPH_MIN_Date,DYBPH_AVG,DYBPH_NINEFIVE,DYHGL_JCDate,DYHGL_HGL,DYHGL_CXL,DYHGL_CSXDate,DYHGL_CXXDate,DYHGL_MAX,DYHGL_MAX_Date,DYHGL_MIN,DYHGL_MIN_Date,DYHGL_AVG,DYHGL_AJCDate,DYHGL_AHGL,DYHGL_ACXL,DYHGL_ACSXDate,DYHGL_ACXXDate,DYHGL_AMAX,DYHGL_AMAX_Date,DYHGL_AMIN,DYHGL_AMIN_Date,DYHGL_AAVG,DYHGL_BJCDate,DYHGL_BHGL,DYHGL_BCXL,DYHGL_BCSXDate,DYHGL_BCXXDate,DYHGL_BMAX,DYHGL_BMAX_Date,DYHGL_BMIN,DYHGL_BMIN_Date,DYHGL_BAVG,DYHGL_CJCDate,DYHGL_CHGL,DYHGL_CCXL,DYHGL_CCSXDate,DYHGL_CCXXDate,DYHGL_CMAX,DYHGL_CMAX_Date,DYHGL_CMIN,DYHGL_CMIN_Date,DYHGL_CAVG,sy_zongcount,sy_acount,sy_bcount,sy_ccount,sy_zongdate,sy_adate,sy_bdate,sy_cdate,sy_zxygdn,sy_fxygdn,sy_zxwgdn,sy_fxwgdn from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select dyzxb_amax,dyzxb_amin,dyzxb_aavg,dyzxb_aninefive,dyzxb_bmax,dyzxb_bmin,dyzxb_bavg,dyzxb_bninefive,dyzxb_cmax,dyzxb_cmin,dyzxb_cavg,dyzxb_cninefive,dlzxb_amax,dlzxb_amin,dlzxb_aavg,dlzxb_aninefive,dlzxb_bmax,dlzxb_bmin,dlzxb_bavg,dlzxb_bninefive,dlzxb_cmax,dlzxb_cmin,dlzxb_cavg,dlzxb_cninefive from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select dx_zongcount,dx_acount,dx_bcount,dx_ccount,dx_zongdate,dx_adate,dx_bdate,dx_cdate,begin_date,abegin_date,bbegin_date,cbegin_date,end_date,aend_date,bend_date,cend_date from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select Right_Active_Power,Right_Reactive_Power,Contrary_Active_Power,Contrary_Reactive_Power from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select MRight_Active_Power,MRight_Active_Demand,MoneDate,MContrary_Active_Power,MContrary_Active_Demand,MthreeDate,MRight_Reactive_Power,MRight_Reactive_Demand,MtwoDate,MContrary_Reactive_Power,MContrary_ReActive_Demand,MfourDate from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select AMAX_PowerM,AMAX_DateM,AMIN_PowerM,AMIN_DateM,RMAX_PowerM,RMAX_DateM,RMIN_PowerM,RMIN_DateM,YS_MAXM,YS_MAX_DateM,YS_MINM,YS_MIN_DateM from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select MDLBPH_MAX,MDLBPH_MAX_Date,MDLBPH_MIN,MDLBPH_MIN_Date,MDLBPH_AVG,MDLBPH_NINEFIVE,MDL_AMAX,MDl_AMAXDate,MDL_AMIN,MDL_AMINDate,MDL_BMAX,MDl_BMAXDate,MDL_BMIN,MDL_BMINDate,MDL_CMAX,MDl_CMAXDate,MDL_CMIN,MDL_CMINDate,MDL_LMAX,MDl_LMAXDate,MDL_LMIN,MDL_LMINDate,Msl_zongcount,Msl_acount,Msl_bcount,Msl_ccount,Msl_zongdate,Msl_adate,Msl_bdate,Msl_cdate,Msl_zxygdn,Msl_fxygdn,Msl_zxwgdn,Msl_fxwgdn from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select DYBPH_JCDateM,DYBPH_HGLM,DYBPH_CXLM,DYBPH_CXDateM,DYBPH_MAXM,DYBPH_MAX_DateM,DYBPH_MINM,DYBPH_MIN_DateM,DYBPH_AVGM,DYBPH_NINEFIVEM,DYHGL_JCDateM,DYHGL_HGLM,DYHGL_CXLM,DYHGL_CSXDateM,DYHGL_CXXDateM,DYHGL_MAXM,DYHGL_MAX_DateM,DYHGL_MINM,DYHGL_MIN_DateM,DYHGL_AVGM,DYHGL_AJCDateM,DYHGL_AHGLM,DYHGL_ACXLM,DYHGL_ACSXDateM,DYHGL_ACXXDateM,DYHGL_AMAXM,DYHGL_AMAX_DateM,DYHGL_AMINM,DYHGL_AMIN_DateM,DYHGL_AAVGM,DYHGL_BJCDateM,DYHGL_BHGLM,DYHGL_BCXLM,DYHGL_BCSXDateM,DYHGL_BCXXDateM,DYHGL_BMAXM,DYHGL_BMAX_DateM,DYHGL_BMINM,DYHGL_BMIN_DateM,DYHGL_BAVGM,DYHGL_CJCDateM,DYHGL_CHGLM,DYHGL_CCXLM,DYHGL_CCSXDateM,DYHGL_CCXXDateM,DYHGL_CMAXM,DYHGL_CMAX_DateM,DYHGL_CMINM,DYHGL_CMIN_DateM,DYHGL_CAVGM,sy_zongcountM,sy_acountM,sy_bcountM,sy_ccountM,sy_zongdateM,sy_adateM,sy_bdateM,sy_cdateM,sy_zxygdnM,sy_fxygdnM,sy_zxwgdnM,sy_fxwgdnM from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select Mdyzxb_amax,Mdyzxb_amin,Mdyzxb_aavg,Mdyzxb_aninefive,Mdyzxb_bmax,Mdyzxb_bmin,Mdyzxb_bavg,Mdyzxb_bninefive,Mdyzxb_cmax,Mdyzxb_cmin,Mdyzxb_cavg,Mdyzxb_cninefive,Mdlzxb_amax,Mdlzxb_amin,Mdlzxb_aavg,Mdlzxb_aninefive,Mdlzxb_bmax,Mdlzxb_bmin,Mdlzxb_bavg,Mdlzxb_bninefive,Mdlzxb_cmax,Mdlzxb_cmin,Mdlzxb_cavg,Mdlzxb_cninefive from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT mdx_zongcount,mdx_acount,mdx_bcount,mdx_ccount,mdx_zongdate,mdx_adate,mdx_bdate,mdx_cdate,mbegin_date,mabegin_date,mbbegin_date,mcbegin_date,mend_date,maend_date,mbend_date,mcend_date from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DataDate = #{monitoringPointDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select createdate,${tag} from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID= #{monitoringPointAliasId} and datadate like concat(concat(${monitoringPointDate}),'%') and LENGTH(datadate)=8 ORDER BY datadate
select createdate,${tag} from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID= #{monitoringPointAliasId} and datadate like concat(concat(${monitoringPointDate}),'%') and LENGTH(datadate)=8 ORDER BY datadate
select createdate,${tag} from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID= #{monitoringPointAliasId} and datadate like concat(concat(${monitoringPointDate}),'%') and LENGTH(datadate)=8 ORDER BY datadate
select createdate,${tag} from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID= #{monitoringPointAliasId} and datadate like concat(concat(${monitoringPointDate}),'%') and LENGTH(datadate)=8 ORDER BY datadate
select createdate,${tag} from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID= #{monitoringPointAliasId} and datadate like concat(concat(${monitoringPointDate}),'%') and LENGTH(datadate)=8 ORDER BY datadate
select createdate,${tag} from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID= #{monitoringPointAliasId} and datadate like concat(concat(${monitoringPointDate}),'%') and LENGTH(datadate)=8 ORDER BY datadate

SELECT YDQY_id YDQYID,GROUP_CONCAT(JCD_AliasID) as JCD_AliasID,YDQY_Name,DF_Name,GROUP_CONCAT(JCD_Name SEPARATOR ',') AS JCD_Name FROM yj_info where mStatus <> -2 and createdate < #{date} GROUP BY YDQYID
call BN_NL_FPG_PP(#{monitoringPointDate,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{monitoringPointAliasId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select IFNULL(Right_Active_Demand,0) from ${tableNameString} where JCD_AliasID= #{monitoringPointAliasId} and datadate like concat(concat('%',${monitoringPointDate}),'%')
SELECT CreateDate,JCD_Name,GJ_INFO FROM ${tableNameString} WHERE JCD_AliasID = #{monitoringPointAliasId} and datadate like concat(concat(${monitoringPointDate}),'%')
CALL BN_JC_YS(#{monitoringPointAliasId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{monitoringPointDate,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select DISTINCT YDQY_Name from yj_info where mStatus = 1

SELECT ttt.timePoint FROM ( SELECT CAST(@rownum:=@rownum+1 AS CHAR) AS rownum,tt.timePoint FROM ( SELECT '00:00' timePoint union all SELECT '00:15' timePoint union all SELECT '00:30' timePoint union all SELECT '00:45' timePoint union all SELECT '01:00' timePoint union all SELECT '01:15' timePoint union all SELECT '01:30' timePoint union all SELECT '01:45' timePoint union all SELECT '02:00' timePoint union all SELECT '02:15' timePoint union all SELECT '02:30' timePoint union all SELECT '02:45' timePoint union all SELECT '03:00' timePoint union all SELECT '03:15' timePoint union all SELECT '03:30' timePoint union all SELECT '03:45' timePoint union all SELECT '04:00' timePoint union all SELECT '04:15' timePoint union all SELECT '04:30' timePoint union all SELECT '04:45' timePoint union all SELECT '05:00' timePoint union all SELECT '05:15' timePoint union all SELECT '05:30' timePoint union all SELECT '05:45' timePoint union all SELECT '06:00' timePoint union all SELECT '06:15' timePoint union all SELECT '06:30' timePoint union all SELECT '06:45' timePoint union all SELECT '07:00' timePoint union all SELECT '07:15' timePoint union all SELECT '07:30' timePoint union all SELECT '07:45' timePoint union all SELECT '08:00' timePoint union all SELECT '08:15' timePoint union all SELECT '08:30' timePoint union all SELECT '08:45' timePoint union all SELECT '09:00' timePoint union all SELECT '09:15' timePoint union all SELECT '09:30' timePoint union all SELECT '09:45' timePoint union all SELECT '10:00' timePoint union all SELECT '10:15' timePoint union all SELECT '10:30' timePoint union all SELECT '10:45' timePoint union all SELECT '11:00' timePoint union all SELECT '11:15' timePoint union all SELECT '11:30' timePoint union all SELECT '11:45' timePoint union all SELECT '12:00' timePoint union all SELECT '12:15' timePoint union all SELECT '12:30' timePoint union all SELECT '12:45' timePoint union all SELECT '13:00' timePoint union all SELECT '13:15' timePoint union all SELECT '13:30' timePoint union all SELECT '13:45' timePoint union all SELECT '14:00' timePoint union all SELECT '14:15' timePoint union all SELECT '14:30' timePoint union all SELECT '14:45' timePoint union all SELECT '15:00' timePoint union all SELECT '15:15' timePoint union all SELECT '15:30' timePoint union all SELECT '15:45' timePoint union all SELECT '16:00' timePoint union all SELECT '16:15' timePoint union all SELECT '16:30' timePoint union all SELECT '16:45' timePoint union all SELECT '17:00' timePoint union all SELECT '17:15' timePoint union all SELECT '17:30' timePoint union all SELECT '17:45' timePoint union all SELECT '18:00' timePoint union all SELECT '18:15' timePoint union all SELECT '18:30' timePoint union all SELECT '18:45' timePoint union all SELECT '19:00' timePoint union all SELECT '19:15' timePoint union all SELECT '19:30' timePoint union all SELECT '19:45' timePoint union all SELECT '20:00' timePoint union all SELECT '20:15' timePoint union all SELECT '20:30' timePoint union all SELECT '20:45' timePoint union all SELECT '21:00' timePoint union all SELECT '21:15' timePoint union all SELECT '21:30' timePoint union all SELECT '21:45' timePoint union all SELECT '22:00' timePoint union all SELECT '22:15' timePoint union all SELECT '22:30' timePoint union all SELECT '22:45' timePoint union all SELECT '23:00' timePoint union all SELECT '23:15' timePoint union all SELECT '23:30' timePoint union all SELECT '23:45' timePoint ) tt,(SELECT @rownum:=-1) r )ttt WHERE MOD(ttt.rownum,#{rowNumber,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})=0

CALL getJLDGJ(#{objectId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tag,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{limitStart,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{limitEnd,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{warningBackDay,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{servicesAreas,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

CALL selectAlarmYDQY(#{ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ynBaseStaffCompanyId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{limitStart,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{limitEnd,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
CALL selectalarmWB(#{ynBaseStaffCompanyId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{limitStart,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{limitEnd,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
CALL getJLDFX(#{monitoringPointAliasId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{monitoringPointDate,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
CALL BNJC_SE_DD(#{monitoringPointAliasId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{monitoringPointDate,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT yi.WBGS_id ynBaseStaffCompanyId, -- 维保公司id yi.WBGS_Name ynBaseStaffCompanyName,-- 维保公司名称 yi.YDQY_id ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseLongId, -- 用电企业id yi.YDQY_Name ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseName -- 用电企业名称 FROM yj_info yi WHERE 1=1 AND yi.WBGS_id = #{ynBaseStaffCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND yi.mStatus > -2
AND yi.YDQY_id= #{ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseLongId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND yi.YDQY_Name like CONCAT('%',#{ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
GROUP BY yi.WBGS_id, yi.WBGS_Name, yi.YDQY_id, yi.YDQY_Name

SELECT yi.WBGS_id ynBaseStaffCompanyId, -- 维保公司id yi.WBGS_Name ynBaseStaffCompanyName,-- 维保公司名称 yi.YDQY_id ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseLongId, -- 用电企业id yi.YDQY_Name ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseName -- 用电企业名称 FROM yj_info yi WHERE 1=1 AND yi.mStatus > -2
AND yi.YDQY_id= #{ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseLongId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND yi.YDQY_Name like CONCAT('%',#{ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND JCD_Area IN
#{item}
GROUP BY yi.WBGS_id, yi.WBGS_Name, yi.YDQY_id, yi.YDQY_Name
UNION SELECT yi.WBGS_id ynBaseStaffCompanyId, -- 维保公司id yi.WBGS_Name ynBaseStaffCompanyName,-- 维保公司名称 yi.YDQY_id ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseLongId, -- 用电企业id yi.YDQY_Name ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseName -- 用电企业名称 FROM yj_info yi WHERE JCD_CoreID='000000000000180601000001'

SELECT yi.WBGS_id ynBaseStaffCompanyId, -- 维保公司id yi.WBGS_Name ynBaseStaffCompanyName,-- 维保公司名称 yi.YDQY_id ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseLongId, -- 用电企业id yi.YDQY_Name ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseName -- 用电企业名称 FROM yj_info yi WHERE 1=1 AND yi.WBGS_id = #{ynBaseStaffCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND yi.mStatus > -2 AND yi.YDQY_id!= 82650 AND yi.YDQY_id!= 84000
AND yi.YDQY_Name like CONCAT('%',#{ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND JCD_Area IN
#{item}
GROUP BY yi.WBGS_id, yi.WBGS_Name, yi.YDQY_id, yi.YDQY_Name
CALL getJLDGJCOUNT(#{objectId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tag,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{warningBackDay,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{servicesAreas,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select count(*)as alarmNumber from jc_gj_83650

select info.DF_id dfId,info.DF_Name dfName ,ifnull((select GROUP_CONCAT(GJ_CLASSTYPE) from jc_gj_83650 where DF_id = info.DF_id and mStatus = 0),0) warningType from yj_info info where info.mStatus!= -2
AND info.YDQY_id= #{ynBaseCustomerEnterpriseLongId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
